items.label: 5621229b5457a3bb24a988ff
items.name: Low Usage Resdiential Service (LURS)
items.description:
Special Conditions of Service:
*Electric service will be provided to each customer whose monthly kWh consumption at the present City address during the 12 month period ending with the current month does not exceed 400 kWh per month, subject to the provisions stated below.
*Customer's monthly consumption may exceed 400 kWh per month not more than 2 times during the 12 month period ending with the current month as long as the usage does not exceed 500 kWh in any month.
*The customer is disqualified from being served under this rate schedule when either: a)the consumption in any month exceeds 500 kWh; or b) the monthly consumption exceeds 400 kWh a third time during the 12 month period ending with the current month. Upon being disqualified, the customer shall be automatically transferred to the Residential Service Rate Schedule effective with the current month until such time as the customer is able to re-qualify for this rate schedule. 

Production Cost Adjustment(PCA): As calculated for each billing month and applied to increase or decrease each kWh consumed by customer.
